Senthil Arivudainambi

Here we go again

31 Aug 2015

It’s been a while since I’ve maintained a blog seriously. After flirting with Ghost, Medium and even Github’s gists, I settled on Jekyll for its ease of use and customization. This is going to be a more of a braindump, somewhere between Twitter and Medium.

Like most Jekyll blog this too is hosted on Github. You can view the source here. The design is originally from Tom Preston-Werner. I forked the original repo and made some minor changes.

A dump of my personal thoughts, ideas, links etc.
Powered by Jekyll. Original theme by Tom Preston-Werner
